Key.Original: If allowed, the player will be able to equip protections to others while having weapon in his hands. If not allowed, the player will have to holster his weapons
Key.English: If allowed, the player will be able to equip protections to others while having weapon in his hands. If not allowed, the player will have to holster his weapons
Key.French: Si autorisé, le joueur pourra équiper des protections aux autres en ayant une arme dans les mains. Si non autorisé, le joueur devra rengainer son arme.
